history.narrative: Law 6-162, the “District of Columbia Government Pay Equity and Training Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-219, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 8, 1986, and September 23, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 9, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-208 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
